official_title: Honoring and recognizing the achievements of Thurgood Marshall and encouraging Congress to award him the Congressional Gold Medal.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Honors the dedication and achievements of the late Thurgood Marshall (the first African-American Justice to serve on the Supreme Court). Calls upon upon Americans to recognize Marshall's contributions to the struggle for equal rights and justice in the United States. Encourages Congress to award Marshall the Congressional Gold Medal.

titles.title: Honoring and recognizing the achievements of Thurgood Marshall and encouraging Congress to award him the Congressional Gold Medal.
